name: Social Distancing Shopping Simulator
description:
Complete your shopping list while practicing social distancing in this stressful simulator!

Made in 10 days for the Spring Bundle hosted by Locally Sourced, this game is an expression of my own frustrations with shopping for groceries during these times of social distancing, quarantine, and making sure to think ahead to avoid sickness. 

Note: This game will be included in Locally Sourced's Spring Bundle when it goes live. Please consider buying the bundle when it's available instead of buying the game from this page. The price listed here is based on an estimated split value between the other games in that bundle, and is intended to be a placeholder.

Controls: 
Mouse: Navigate Menus
WASD: Move
E: Interact
Q: "Suggest" other shoppers move
Shift: Run
